person.persName: Samuel Beard (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Emmaline Edwards Beard in Harrison County, Kentucky, on October 26, 1838. Father of James T. Beard, William A. Beard, and Frances E. Beard. Married to Eleanor "Ellen" R. Edwards Beard in Harrison County on June 11, 1849. Father of Sarah Beard, Samuel Beard, and Russell B. Beard. Licensed to marry Leah Conrad Beard in Harrison County on November 30, 1865. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Harrison County in 1864.
